title: 60 kids in hospital after Wasp Attack in Moneragala
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); 60 school students in Atimale, Moneragala were hospitalized following an attack by Wasps.
Police Spokesman, SSP Nihal Thalduwa stated that the incident took place when a wasp nest fell to the ground during the Monday (14) morning assembly.
